item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: cpothemes_demo
item.content:encoded:
The CPO Core comes with plenty of useful shortcodes giving you a lot of options when creating content for your site. The following are present in all of our themes, provided you have the latest version of the Core:

Buttons

[ct_column_half]

Small Size

[ct_button size="small" color="red" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="orange" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="yellow" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="green" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="teal" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="blue" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="purple" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="pink" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="white" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="gray" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button size="small" color="black" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [/ct_column_half] [ct_column_half_last]

Normal Size

[ct_button color="red" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="orange" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="yellow" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="green" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="teal" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="blue" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="purple" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="pink" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="white" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="gray" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [ct_button color="black" href="#"]My Button[/ct_button] [/ct_column_half_last] [ct_separator icon="chevron-down" top="Back To Top"]

Accordions

[ct_column_half] [ct_accordion title="Closed Accordion"]This is the content of an accordion. You can add any kind of HTML content in here![/ct_accordion] [ct_accordion title="Another Accordion"]This is another accordion. Message Boxes

[ct_message]This is a normal message.[/ct_message] [ct_column_half] [ct_message type='ok']This is a confirmation message.[/ct_message][ct_message type='info']This is an info message.[/ct_message] [/ct_column_half] [ct_column_half_last] [ct_message type='error']This is an error message. [/ct_message][ct_message type='warning']This is a warning message.[/ct_message] [/ct_column_half_last] [ct_separator icon="chevron-down" top="Back To Top"]

Tabbed Content

No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?[/ct_tab] [/ct_tabs] [/ct_column_half] [ct_column_half_last] [ct_tabs style="vertical"] [ct_tab title="First"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
